channel.title: Comments on: Webinar today – Scaling Web Services with MySQL Cluster, Part 1: An Alternative to MySQL Server & memcached
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../webinar-today-scaling-web-services-with-mysql-cluster-part-1-an-alternative-to-mysql-server-memcached/index.html#comment-398">Richard</a>.
Hi Richard - the webinar replay can be found at http://www.mysql.com/news-and-events/on-demand-webinars/display-od-545.html
Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Richard.

Hi Richard – the webinar replay can be found at http://www.mysql.com/news-and-events/on-demand-webinars/display-od-545.html

Andrew.

item.title: By: Richard
item.dc:creator: Richard
item.description: Is it possible to get a transcript or slide deck? The Mysql website returns an error when looking for the seminar page.
item.content:encoded: Is it possible to get a transcript or slide deck? The Mysql website returns an error when looking for the seminar page.
